title: BREAKFAST BAR INCLUDED IN THIS ONE-BEDROOM APARTMENT
posting_body: Welcome Home to Solis at FlamingoMadrid Solis at <URL>Address: 3275 East Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV 89121Want more information?

x886 Property Description  This one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment from Solis at Flamingo has a well-designed interior with wood-style vinyl flooring and a spacious living room with oversized windows.
The layout has a separate dining area with an extra closet to store cookbooks, tablecloths, and other items.
Stylish details decorate the kitchen interior which has a glass tile backsplash and faux granite tops on the counters and breakfast bar.
In addition to this, the kitchen also comes with stainless steel GE appliances and upgrades of new hardware and lighting.
The construction of the bedroom includes a private bathroom and a large closet as well.
Residents will appreciate the community’s garden-style setting with a pet park, grilling stations, and resort-style pools.
The community has easy access to Interstate 515 and 593.
